attributes.action: DESIST from all the hysteria about climate change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The climate changes every x million years of its own accord.
Even if there were any truth in CO2 emissions, more than 80% of these are NOT caused by cars, trucks and aeroplanes. So why is 100% of the "remedy" addressed at less than 20% of the "problem"?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
